title: Paper Accepted by ICES'25
content: One paper was accepted by The 2025 IEEE International Conference on Energy & Sustainability (ICES'25)!

title: Paper Accepted by JSD
content: One paper was accepted by Journal of Sustainable Development (JSD)!

title: Paper Accepted by IEEE TEE
content: One paper was accepted by IEEE Transactions on Environmental Engineering (TEE), congratulations ðŸŽ‰!!!

title: EPA Research Grant Award
content: Alex was awarded the EPA Research Grant to support his work on advanced water filtration technologies.

title: Paper Accepted by IEEE TAE
content: One paper was accepted by IEEE Transactions on Agricultural Engineering (TAE)!

title: University Research Tuition Grant
content: Alex was awarded the University Research Tuition Grant, nearly $35,000.

title: Graduation from NTU
content: Alex graduated from Northern Technical University with honors in Environmental Engineering. Thanks to all the professors, senior students and friends who helped him in the past four years.

title: Presidential Scholarship Award
content: Alex was awarded the Presidential Scholarship for his top 1% academic performance in the Environmental Engineering department, which is the highest honor for university students in the country.
